CustomField.description: Enter the API names of the fields that need to be displayed in this section on the edit page. There will be two columns and you would need to enter the fields in that sequence you want to see. Eg: enter 1,2,3,4,5,6 to see 1_____2 3_____4 5_____6
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the API names of the fields that need to be displayed in this section on the edit page. There will be two columns and you would need to enter the fields in that sequence you want to see. Eg: enter 1,2,3,4,5,6 to see 1_____2 3_____4 5_____6
CustomField.label: Fields On Edit Page
